ualive?.desr: Check if the bot is working

imaboi.desr:
Set your role to King

_* This is exclusive to Lymerist_

imagurl.desr:
Set your role to Queen

_* This is exclusive to Lymerist_

roll.desr:
Roll a number from 0 to 100

You could also roll a different range of number if you provide a number.

tellajoke.desr: Tell a joke from r/ShortCleanFunny or r/DirtyJokes

submitjoke.desr: Tell me a joke. I will save it for future use.
submitjoke.usage:
`.submitjoke What do Japanese people says when they have itchy knees?
一二三`

pick.desr:
Pick a random user in discord.

By default, it will only choose user and not bots.

If you wish to include bots in the selection add `bot` behind the command.

If you wish to not include offline users, then add `online` at the end of command

scareme.desr:
Fetch top posts from r/TwoSentenceHorror

Warning: Its disturbing, proceed on your risk

play.desr:
For now theres only 1 game, I might add more games in future.
`.end` to end a ongoing game

lvling.desr: Ask coryn for bosses to farm in toram.

gamblestat.desr: Want to know the correct way to gamble ?

eval.desr: Sorry but only Looz can use this. As for why, you could ask Looz to explain himself

tomana.desr:
Abbreviated from TOram MAp NAvigator.
Forgot how to get to one place to another in toram? Use me !
You can get a list of map names and their id using `.torammap`

torammap.desr: View a list of toram maps with their id to be used in `.tomana`

anilist.desr:
Use this command to see your anilist.co recent activities (only manga and anime)
You need to link your anilist.co profile first to use it

prefix.desr:
Change commands prefix for this server

For now i only accept 1 character as prefix, will allow multiple char in future
